task.title: Muting and unmuting my audio
task.shortdesc: Meeting participants can mute () and unmute () their microphones on demand. Sametime notifies users when background noise is detected and when users speak while being muted. When needed, moderators can disable the participants' microphones at any time without notification. Most devices have a dedicated mute button that is controlled separately. When using Sametime, users can utilize the web app microphone settings.

taskbody.prereq: Permission is required for every browser used to access Sametime.
